Desc.entry: Two reading groups that meet monthly to discuss a previously chosen book.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-7.30pm, Tues, Wed & Fri 10am-5.30pm, Sat 10am-4pm (library opening hours); 1st Mon in the month 6.30-7.30pm and 2nd Mon in the month 6.30-7.30pm (reading groups, please contact for details as waiting lists may be in operation)
